Welcome to ISSAC 2007 and Waterloo!

The International Symposium on Symbolic and Algebraic Computation (ISSAC) is the premier annual conference to present and discuss new developments and original research results in all areas of symbolic mathematical computation.

A special issue of the Journal of Symbolic Computation is planned to feature revised versions of ISSAC 2007 papers.

ISSAC 2007 took place in the Davis Centre at the University of Waterloo in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada, July 29-August 1, 2007.

The full program for ISSAC 2007 is now available.


Symbolic Computation Group
Cheriton School of Computer Science
University of Waterloo
200 University Avenue West
Waterloo, Ontario, Canada N2L 3G1
